descriptionHtml:
[color=red][size=10]Falskaar Fast Travel[/size][/color]

[size=3]Fast Travel between Falskaar and Skyrim => Solstheim Style[/size]

============================================================================================
[size=4][color=yellow]IMPORTANT NOTIFICATION:
If you also have Dragonborn and/or Wyrmstooth Mods.
Then you might want to switch over to my new mod. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38465/]Island Fast Travel[/url]
Fast Travel between Any of the 3 popular islands [/color][/size]
ISLAND FAST TRAVEL includes Falskaar Fast Travel.
It is basically an improved and expanded version of FFT 
============================================================================================

[color=red]Q.[/color] What does this mod do ?
[color=red]A.[/color] It adds Fast Travel Map Markers to and from Falskaar and Skyrim.
Falskaar is a DLC sized new land mod. By AlexanderJVelicky
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37994/]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37994/[/url]

[color=red]Q.[/color] Are the map fast travel markers active by default ?.
[color=red]A.[/color] No. The map markers will only show up after you did the \"Passage Home\" Quest.

[color=red]Q.[/color] But im already way past that....
[color=red]A.[/color] No problem the markers will then become active shortly after you started a game with this mod.

[color=red]Q.[/color] Will this mod break the excellent Falskaar MOD ?
[color=red]A.[/color] NO.! Extremely doubtful because this mod only adds 2 Map Markers to the game

[color=red]Q.[/color] Required mods ?
[color=red]A.[/color] Falskaar !

[color=red]Q.[/color] What about load order ?
[color=red]A.[/color] Does not matter, anywhere in the list.

[color=red]Q.[/color] How to un/install?
[color=red]A.[/color] Use NMM.    
Install manual:: Unzip the files in to the data folder.
Uninstall Manual:: Delete files
\\Data\\falskaarfasttravel.esp
\\Data\\Scripts\\aaFalskaarFastTravel_QF_020022EF.pex
\\Data\\Scripts\\fskr_qf_fssq02_010b9f0e.pex
\\Data\\Scripts\\Source\\aaFalskaarFastTravel_QF_020022EF.psc
\\Data\\Scripts\\Source\\fskr_qf_fssq02_010b9f0e.psc

Also see the ReadMe file. (also included in the zipfile)

[color=red]Q.[/color] Is that all the info I need ?
[color=red]A.[/color] Yes.  This is just a tiny mod. not much else to say :)

======================
My Other Mods :
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38465/]Island Fast Travel[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37371/]Slaughter Fish Nemesis[/url]
======================

Have Fun.
author: Shrike

files.name: Falskaar Fast Travel  v1-1
files.changelogHtml:
Moved lose files into a FalskaarFastTravel.bsa no more lose files to worry about. lots easier for manual installation and managing files in mod managers/organizers
Changed the way the falskaar fast travel to skyrim and skyrim to falskaar are initialized.
Removed the fskr_qf_fssq02_010b9f0e.pex from the mod. It was a mistake to hack into the original falskaar quest to enable the fast travel markers. That method was more prone to cause problems.
ie: Future falskaar updates and or initialization problems during a NEW game setup. Posible priority racing between my mod and falskaar mod.
Added readme.txt with upgrade and un/install instructions to reflect the v1.1 changes
